user.title: Connect to AI Hub
user.description: Enter your ZhipuAI API key (required) and Silicon Flow API key (optional, for speech recognition functionality). Get ZhipuAI key [here]({api_key_url}) and Silicon Flow key from their official website.

data.siliconflow_api_key: Silicon Flow API Key (optional, for speech recognition)

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to AI Hub service

abort.already_configured: This API key is already configured

init.title: Configuration Options
init.description:
Please find the corresponding subentries (Conversation Agent or AI Task) in the integration details page, and click the configuration button on the right side of each subentry to modify settings.

Click 'AI Hub' on the integrations page to enter the details page, where you will see the list of configured subentries, each of which can be configured individually.

abort.configure_via_subentries: Please configure conversation and AI task through subentries. Find the corresponding subentries in the devices page.

init.title: Configure Conversation Agent
init.description: Customize the behavior and parameters of the conversation agent. Enable recommended mode to use the best settings, or disable it to customize all parameters. After submitting, the configuration information will be switched.

data_description.max_history_messages: Number of history messages to keep

init.title: Configure AI Task
init.description: Customize AI task behavior and parameters. Enable recommended mode for best settings, or disable to customize all parameters. After submitting, the configuration information will be switched.

init.title: Configure Edge TTS Voice
init.description: Customize Edge TTS text-to-speech parameters. Edge TTS is a free TTS service provided by Microsoft, supporting multiple voices and languages.

data_description.voice: Select Edge TTS voice, like Xiaoxiao, Yunxi, etc.
data_description.lang: Select voice language, like zh-CN for Chinese

init.title: Configure Silicon Flow ASR
init.description: Customize Silicon Flow ASR speech-to-text parameters. Silicon Flow provides high-quality ASR service supporting multiple models and languages.

data_description.model: Select ASR model: FunAudioLLM/SenseVoiceSmall (recommended) or TeleAI/TeleSpeechASR

init.title: Configure WeChat Notification
init.description: Configure Bemfa cloud WeChat notification function. Enable recommended mode to use best settings.

data_description.bemfa_uid: Bemfa provided user ID for sending WeChat messages

init.title: Configure Component Translation
init.description: Configure component translation function. Use Zhipu AI to automatically translate English translation files to Chinese.

data_description.custom_components_path: Custom components directory path, default is custom_components

generate_image.name: Generate Image
generate_image.description: Generate image using AI Hub CogView model

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.description: Describe the image content to generate

analyze_image.name: Analyze Image
analyze_image.description: Analyze image content using AI Hub

image_file.name: Image File
image_file.description: Path to the image file to analyze

message.name: Analysis Prompt
message.description: Tell AI how to analyze this image

tts_speech.name: Edge TTS Speech Synthesis
tts_speech.description: Convert text to speech using Edge TTS

text.name: Text
text.description: Text content to convert to speech

voice.name: Voice
voice.description: Select Edge TTS voice, like zh-CN-XiaoxiaoNeural

rate.name: Rate
rate.description: Speech rate adjustment, like +10% faster, -10% slower

volume.name: Volume
volume.description: Speech volume adjustment, like +10% louder, -10% quieter

pitch.name: Pitch
pitch.description: Speech pitch adjustment, like +10Hz higher, -10Hz lower

media_player_entity.name: Media Player
media_player_entity.description: Media player entity to play speech

stt_transcribe.name: Silicon Flow ASR Transcription
stt_transcribe.description: Convert speech to text using Silicon Flow ASR

audio_file.name: Audio File
audio_file.description: Path to audio file to transcribe (supports mp3, wav, flac formats)

model.name: ASR Model
model.description: Speech recognition model to use: FunAudioLLM/SenseVoiceSmall (recommended) or TeleAI/TeleSpeechASR
